title: Kuchař
content:
Kuchař, trpaslíci, who seems to be affiliated with the band of mercenaries hired by Merwin and Sabrina. He can be found by the campfire north of tábor where he takes little convincing to play some kostky. He also buys and sells a variety of goods:

jídlo: maliny, plástev medu, ryby
alkohol: trpasličí špiritus, pepřovka, špiritus s wyverní krví
křesadlo
husí sádlo a medvědí sádlo

He'll buy: balissa, vlčí aloe, alkohol a jídlo.

Galerie
the cook's area
